Posts.Content: Jlove1821 wrote: Has anyone been told by their breast surgeon they don't need radiation without seeing a radiation oncologist? With stage 1a..im not sure if it's necessary to see one? Dx 12/6/2017, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- (FISH) Surgery 1/3/2018 Mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Chemotherapy 2/15/2018 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation oncologist? Jlove1821 Georgia1
